title: cellranger_demux

Cell Ranger demux pipeline.

## Argument help

Run the following command to view the workflow's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script /home/rcannood/workspace/jnj/openpipeline/workflows/ingestion/cellranger_demux/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name             |Description                                           |Attributes                                  |
|:----------------|:-----------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------|
|`--id`           |ID of the sample.                                     |string, required, example: "foo"            |
|`--input`        |A BCL directory.                                      |file, required, example: "/path/to/bcl"     |
|`--sample_sheet` |The sample sheet for the samples to be demultiplexed. |file, required, example: "sample_sheet.csv" |
|`--cores`        |Set max cores the pipeline may request at one time.   |integer, example: 2                         |
|`--memory`       |Set max GB the pipeline may request at one time.      |integer, example: 10                        |
:::
